description:
Overview

Smog is a 3D third-person action-adventure game where you explore a fallen zeppelin and fight enemies in exciting turn based combat.

In the distant future, Earth has been covered in smog, so the people have taken to the skies living in large cities atop zeppelins. Play as a young researcher studying the smog, who finds themselves in an abandoned zeppelin that loses power and falls beneath the smog. Fight off mysterious smog creatures in turn-based combat and explore the ship to learn more about the world.

Controls
  • Overworld
    • WASD - Move player
    • Mouse - Move camera
    • Right click - Activate ADS mode
    • Left click - Shoot projectiles
    • E - Interact with objects
  • Combat
    • Tab - Open combat menu when stamina is full
    • Left mouse - Select option from combat menu and perform combos
